item.title: FLSmidth Has Firepower for Big M&A After Asset Sales, CEO Says
item.description: FLSmidth & Co. A/S, which agreed to sell two large assets in June, now has the ability to conduct large acquisitions because the Danish engineering group’s balance sheet has been strengthened, Chi
